projects.title: Online Student Clearance System
projects.description: A comprehensive MERN stack application for managing student clearance processes with role-based access control and automated workflow management.

projects.title: Adama Administration Inventory Management
projects.description: Full-featured inventory management system with real-time tracking, analytics dashboard, and automated reporting for efficient resource management.

projects.title: Student Management System
projects.description: Complete student information system with grade management, attendance tracking, and parent portal integration for seamless communication.

projects.title: Movie Reservation Management System
projects.description: Interactive movie booking platform with seat selection, payment integration, and real-time availability updates for theaters.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Feature-rich chat application with private messaging, group chats, file sharing, and real-time notifications using Socket.io.

messages.name: John Doe
messages.subject: Project Collaboration
messages.message: Hi Nati, I came across your portfolio and I am impressed with your MERN stack projects. I would love to discuss a potential collaboration opportunity.

messages.name: Sarah Smith
messages.subject: Job Opportunity
messages.message: Hello, we have an exciting full-stack developer position at our company. Your skills align perfectly with what we are looking for.

messages.name: Mike Johnson
messages.subject: Freelance Project
messages.message: Hi Nati, we need help building a student management system similar to your clearance project. Are you available for freelance work?
